channel.title: Client troubble
channel.description: OK so I released my client to the world today but no one can get on it beccause they get an error message but other clients work, the client I am using is the Ddsspeced client. I have set it so the IP is set to my server's IP but it won't work... Can somebody help me please?

item.title: Client troubble
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

OK so I released my client to the world today but no one can get on it beccause they get an error message but other clients work, the client I am using is the Ddsspeced client. I have set it so the IP is set to my server’s IP but it won’t work… Can somebody help me please?
